media:group.media:title: Healed and Forgiven
media:group.media:description:
â¤ Testimonies of Changed Lives - https://www.amazingfacts.org/news-and-features/changed-lives â¤ Share Your Testimony - https://www.amazingfacts.org/about-us/tell-your-story
By the time Vincent was 19, he had been swept away with the world. He listened to satanic music that blasphemed Jesus. In fact, his fall into darkness was so deep that, one day, while listening to this music, he carved â€˜666â€™ into the knuckles on his handâ€”deep enough to make sure the scars stay. But when Amazing Facts Study Guides and DVDs made it into his hands, his life and his wife's began to change â€¦ and a wonderful, modern-day miracle of healing took place!

media:group.media:title: Changed Lives - Teresita
media:group.media:description:
â¤ Testimonies of Changed Lives - https://www.amazingfacts.org/news-and-features/changed-lives â¤ Share Your Testimony - https://www.amazingfacts.org/about-us/tell-your-story
Teresita's shares her testimony of how she used to be a nun in a convent but was yearning for something more inside. By the providence of God she received an invitation to the Millennium of Prophecy seminar ... watch her story to learn what happened.
